Package gw.api.exposure

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PublicCatastropheFinder
    Provides methods for finding Catastrophes.
    PublicExposureDesktopViewFinder
    Provides methods for finding exposure view entities to display on the exposure desktop page.
    PublicExposureFinder
    Provides methods for finding Exposures.
    PublicExposureTeamViewFinder
    Provides a set of finders for fetching specific sets of ExposureTeamView entities for use with the Team screens.
    PublicExposureVacationViewFinder
    Provides methods for finding exposure view entities to display on the exposure desktop page.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClaimExposuresFilterSet
    Provides the filter set for the LV showing a Claim's Exposures.
    ClaimExposuresHelper
    Helper for ClaimExposures page, gives way to see if an exposure is being edited.
    CurrentExposureHelper
    UI Helper class for accessing the current Exposure.
    DesktopExposureFilterSet
    This is the filter set for the desktop exposures page.
    ExposureAssignmentPopup
    Helper for the assign Exposure UI.
    ExposureFilterSetBase
    Base exposure filter set containing filters available in all exposure filter sets.
    ExposureUtil
    Utility methods for working with Exposures.
    NewExposureMenuItem
    Represents an item in the new exposure menu.
    NewExposureMenuUtil
    Contains utility methods for new exposure menus.
    NewExposureMenuUtil.PolicyChecksum  
    OwnedRelatedExposureFilterSetBase
    Abstract exposure filter set that adds compound filters based on owned and related exposures to the ExposureFilterSetBase.
